resources.string: Metronome is a simple metronome app that is designed to be easy to use and look nice. To keep this app free to use without ads and support the development of other apps like it, please consider making a donation using the button below.
Metronome is open source and free to use without advertisements. Please consider supporting my work so that I can continue to maintain this project & others like it!
Do you want to add this shortcut to your home screen?
Network error: couldn\'t get purchase data.

This app is free to download and use, and contains absolutely no advertisements or otherwise privacy-invasive or intrusive malware. However moral it may be, this stance offers comparatively little profit. In place of that cost, please consider supporting my work so that I can continue to maintain this project & others like it!
This popup does not limit the functionality of this app; you can press \'use anyway\' to ignore this message and continue using the app as normal. Buying the pro key will remove these dialogs.
